thread.title: Rihanna looks like a gothic tulip in her orange bra top ensemble at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Rihanna looks like a gothic tulip in her orange bra top ensemble at the Grammys

author: Gabriela Herstik
title: Rihanna looks like a gothic tulip in her orange bra top ensemble at the Grammys
text:
Rihanna looks like a gothic tulip in her orange bra top ensemble at the Grammys Leave it to Rihanna to show up at the Grammy’s in an orange halter top and still look like, well, Rihanna. Clad in custom Armani Privé, Rihanna looked the most beautiful, gothic, tulip we’ve ever seen. In a bejeweled orange halter top, and a high-waisted black sculptural skirt, the 8-time Grammy nominated artist killed the red carpet game. With a simple smokey eye, nude, glossy lip and plenty of diamonds, Rihanna looked like the glamorous bad girl that we love.
Steve Granitz/Getty We love how daring this look is, and that the singer chose to accessorize with statement earrings and silhouettes that showed off her tattoos. Steve Granitz/Getty 
Honestly, is there anything that Rihanna can’t pull off? We like to think these colors are off limits except at Halloween, but Rihanna has made us think twice.
Steve Granitz/Getty And with a barely-there back, Rihanna has the look-back down pat. If only we could look half as fierce as she does and we’d be set.
Chris Jackson/Getty Slay the game, Rihanna!
